name: (G)I-DLE - TOMBOY
author: rdmclin2
readme:
Thank you very much for your support!
I hope you will enjoy this motion!

-----------------------------------------------

Rules:
- DO NOT redistribute this motion!
- DO NOT resell this motion!
- DO NOT claim as your own!
- Credit me! Put my name {NatsumiSan} in your video description or add link to my original video!
- R16, R18, etc. are allowed!
- Enjoy! <3

-----------------------------------------------

Your model must have the following bones
for the motion to work correctly:

右肩P - shoulderP_R
左肩P - shoulderP_L
右腕捩 - arm twist_R
左腕捩 - arm twist_L
右手捩 - wrist twist_R
左手捩 - wrist twist_L
上半身2 - upper-body2
腰 - waist

Advice:
For correct work of motion, SemiStandart Bones are necessarily. Please be sure that your models have SemiStandart Bones.

Also look at this tutorial to fix hands:
https://youtu.be/vpmrE7GpxyQ

-----------------------------------------------

May 2022 ~NatsumiSan~
